page.title: 19CORONATION GARDENS.
page.content: CORONATION GARDENS is a park and big garden situated between Oliver Road and Leyton High Road.In the garden there is a cenotaph in memory of the dead in the two World Wars. Coronation Gardens is a beautiful park because it has lovely flowers and a beautiful fish pond. In the park there are swings,a see-saw,a slide,a roundabout,a climbing frame and a rocking horse. Coronation Gardens sometimes has a band of musicians playing music on tha bandstand.During the year many clubs and societies have fetes in Coronation Gardens.They also have a Donkey Derby there once or twice a year.
